terms.definition: This refers to the specific laws of a particular jurisdiction that will be used to interpret and enforce the terms of a contract.
This formal phrase is used at the end of a legal document, introducing the signatures of the parties to confirm their agreement.
This is a person hired to perform work for another but who maintains control over how the work is done, rather than being an employee.
This word typically introduces the operative part of an agreement, following the background statements.
This word signals that a conclusion or action is being stated as a result of something previously mentioned.
This word is used to introduce background information or recitals that explain the context or reasons for the agreement.
This means 'mentioned previously' or 'referred to before' in the document.
An agent is a person authorized to act on behalf of another individual or entity.
This phrase is used to identify the parties who are formally entering into an agreement.
This refers to the laws of a specific jurisdiction that will be applied to interpret and resolve disputes related to a contract or legal matter.
These are clauses in a contract that specify which jurisdiction's laws will apply if there's a legal dispute involving different legal systems.
In contract law, consideration is something of value exchanged between parties that makes a contract legally binding.
This means 'interpreted' or 'understood' in a particular way.
An employee is a person hired to work for another person or company, typically under their direction and control.
When a document is executed, it means it has been fully signed and legally completed, making it effective.
This means 'in this document' or 'in this agreement'.
This is a participant in a temporary business arrangement or project undertaken by two or more parties for a specific purpose.
This phrase indicates that a contract or agreement has been formally created and accepted by the parties.
These are the reciprocal agreements and pledges made by all parties involved in a contract.
These are the individuals, companies, or groups who are legally bound by a contract or involved in a legal matter.
A partner is one of two or more individuals or entities who co-own and operate a business together.
This is the primary location where a company's executive decisions are made or its main operations are conducted.
These are confidential business information that provides a company with a competitive advantage.
